A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Honestly\, and maybe I'm just old\, but after seeing this movie my reaction was just \"meh.\" It is not even close to being a great Star Wars movie\, has far too many plot holes\, etc... Was it ok? Yes. But it made me like The Force Awakens even more and appreciate that Star Wars history was respected in the prequels. \n\nAgain\, I'm old (51)\, so I get that I may just be yelling at a cloud.
